title: Title bar buttons don't work when pressing Alt
content:
Hello,

I have a problem with Firefox. I think this is a bug.

When I press Alt, the complete title bar with the menus File, Edit, View, ... appears. Afterwards, when I click Minimize, Maximize, Close, New Tab or List All Tabs, the title bar is minimized again but nothing else happens. Those buttons just don't work.

I have tested this in Firefox 85, 86 and 87.

Is there a way to fix this problem? Is it likely to be fixed sooner than three months/six months/years?

Please tell me how I can add anymore useful information. Thanks for your support!
creator: browserlightedup

title: Active device "Last seen 2 months ago"
content:
Hi, I regularly Sync between three devices. The devices are

- PC

- Phone

- Microsoft Surface

PC and Phone are working fine. I can send Tabs between those devices with no problems(my main use of Sync). Unfortunately the Surface doesn't show up as an active device. Sync shows it as "Last seen 2 months ago" so I am unable to send Tabs to that device.

I can Sync the Surface just fine. When I click "Sync Now" it successfully Syncs with no error but the device still shows as "Last seen 2 months ago". Firefox is fully updated on all devices.

Any help would be appreciated. Thanks!

creator: fmm_dj

title: Search queries form address bar being cut off
content:
Often when I do a search from the address bar, the search query is cut off at some point.

Say I want to search for "tofu quiche recipe", so I write "tofu quiche recipe" in the address bar and press Enter. This will often cause Firefox to search for "tofu quiche reci" or just "tofu qui". Even if the entered query, "tofu quiche recipe", is displayed in the address bar itself, it seems that the primary option in the drop down will have a certain delay in updating and say "tofu qui — Search with DuckDuckGo", and thus when Enter is pressed, Firefox will drop the last part of the query.

The issue doesn't happen when searching from the new tab page or directly from a search engine site, only from the address bar.
creator: hjek

title: Login on some websites causes errors and pictures are not displayed
content:
The web pages of https://www.heise.de serve as an example of the error. The publisher's main page shows the article images, while the article itself is without an image. In other browsers, Chrome and Opera, the images are visible in the articles. The error has been occurring for a few days, the time cannot be specified exactly. I have already turned off the ad blocker for heise.de without success. An update to FF86 was unsuccessful. A check of the FF settings did not bring any results either. Websites from other publishers e.g. www.techstage.de are not affected as far as I know.

In addition, the title bar always shows the context Login, although I am logged in. On some websites, e.g. http://www.ebay-kleinanzeigen.de, the login generates an error.


Operating system Linux openSuse Leap 15.2
creator: roland.reutlinger

title: Mysql problem only in Firefox not in other browsers
content:
I'm having a problem with mysqli update of one column. It doesn't work in firefox but works in chrome, opera and edge.

As you can see below the statement itself consist from ten different values and all the others are inserted correctly in all browsers. Problem is with the first column named wolny_zajety - it is 0 by default and it doesn't update to 1.

Here is my code:

$busy = 1;

$stmt = $con->prepare("UPDATE rezerwacje_opony SET wolny_zajety = ?, usluga = ?, opony = ?, numer_rejestracyjny = ?, marka = ?, model = ?, imie = ?, telefon = ?, email = ?, opcjonalne_informacje = ? WHERE data = '".$day."' AND godzina = '".$hour."'");

$stmt->bind_param('isssssssss', $busy, $service, $additional, $registry, $make, $model, $fullname, $phone, $email, $infofromuser);

$stmt->execute();

$stmt->close();

I tried several things but nothing works. Can anybody help me?
creator: pawel-p-81

title: bookmarks wasted space to left of columns
content:
For some reason, my long column (about 1,000 bookmarks) have an intolerable indent space/empty area to the left of each entry...about 2-3 in long and for all bookmarks, so that I have to stretch out the names and reduce my main viewer window as a result. 

   IF I try to just move the whole lot leftward, that cuts out the "bookmarks" with the black star as well as search bookmarks entry bar.  A long time ago, I thought it had a left right scroll tab at the very bottom.  All support entries talk about moving the whole column to the right side of the screen-what I need is 1) an ability to move all bookmarks titles to the left edge as much as possible while keeping orientation with the top "star/bookmarks".    I do use a zoom button for browsing the web, but reducing screen size has nothing to do with the overly fat/wide bookmarks area-there has got to be a way to put it on a diet!!!

BONUS: if anyone knows on a Mac running High Sierra or any other os, how the heck do you increase size of other menus that don't respond to zoom (command + or _)..even ones not on Firefox? Any recommended zoom apps for menus intrinsic to macs in general?

title: Firefox 86 "Total Cookie Protection": I want no "automatic exceptions"
content:
Quoted from: https://www.theregister.com/2021/02/24/firefox_cookies_86/ ..."it's Total Cookie Protection With Some Exceptions, Handled Automatically" ..."Meanwhile, Google and its ad tech frenemies are racing to develop various Privacy Sandbox proposals so they can implement behavioral ad targeting"

I don't WANT exceptions! Behavioral ad targeting is exactly what I'm trying to avoid. I don't want Google shaping my searches and influencing my opinions by "telling me what I want to hear"...it thinks! Total Cookie Protection sounded exciting until I read this. How do we force it to work "without automatic exceptions"?

I was excited about this new feature because it might allow me to stay logged in to sites like Google and Amazon without their infamous tracking and search-shaping. If not this setting is pretty useless.

title: New windows endless loop
content:
I am using Firefox 85.0.2 (64-bit) on a Macbook running OS X 10.13.6.

This problem has been afflicting me for six months or so. On certain websites that open a new page in a new window, the new window instantly enters what I would describe as a "resizing loop": the window starts small and immediately maximizes. Each time it fills the screen, though, it immediately shrinks back down and starts again. This looping behavior continues endlessly, until I kill Firefox or somehow manage to get the malfunctioning window to close. On my employer's webmail, for instance, I'm not able to compose a new message, because it tries to open a new window and gets stuck.

The resizing is very fast and very incessant, fast enough to induce nausea in the unsuspecting user. Can anyone offer any suggestions?

title: Firefox has stopped working. Can't open it either normally nor in Safe mode.
content:
Hi. Has anyone ever had this problem where Firefox suddenly does not work even after reinstalling it?

I updated my Nvidia drivers to 461.40 and when I opened Firefox, it just came up with a blank white window.

I tried entering Safe mode by holding down the Shift button and opening it again but it just hung on the safe mode window that comes up. Tried pressing the buttons but nothing happened.

I thought it must have been the Nvidia update that's done this but I rolled back to the previous version and now Firefox won't even open. It just shows up as a process in task manager.

I've uninstalling and reinstalling to no avail.

Am I missing something?

Is there something in the old profiles that's preventing Firefox to open again?

I believe I was using Firefox 86, running Windows 10 Home.
creator: Zeon04

title: Message Banners Upon Opening Firefox for Windows 10
content:
I'm surprised that a community-based web developer would flood its users with constant messages. I'm referring to when I open Firefox for Windows, and constantly receive message banners at the bottom of the browser. You'd half expect it from a commercial web developer, but even they refrain from doing that.

Please stop this practice as it's very annoying and distracting. Perhaps a menu option for "Suggestions" where the user may opt to view such messages is a better idea than thrusting them constantly on the user.

In better news, I've noticed Firefox is a faster, less clunky browser than it has been in the past - good work :)

creator: sadiqowy

title: Memenangkan lotere - saat mimpi menjadi mimpi buruk
content:
Orang-orang mengklaim impian Australia yang hebat adalah kepemilikan rumah. Sampah. Ini memenangkan TattsLotto. Sejak saya masih kecil, satu pertanyaan muncul di sekitar meja dapur, di pub, sambil minum kopi, dan bahkan di tempat tidur: apa yang akan Anda lakukan jika memenangkan TattsLotto?

Baru-baru ini, mimpi itu berubah menjadi aneh ketika kami mengikuti kisah tentang seorang pria yang tampaknya biasa-biasa saja di Victoria yang mengumpulkan uang dari teman-temannya selama bertahun-tahun untuk menjalankan sindikat , membeli tiket lotere yang kaya mimpi di 3D COLORADO.

Tahun lalu, dia tampaknya tiba-tiba berhenti bekerja, membeli rumah besar dan mobil cepat dan memulai hidup mewah.

Kira-kira pada waktu yang sama, seorang pemenang tanpa nama dari Victoria rupanya telah mengumpulkan A $ 16 juta dalam lotere 3D WASHINGTON yang sama dengan sindikat yang telah menginvestasikan uang dan impian yang diperoleh dengan susah payah.

Teman-temannya menjadi curiga. Dia awalnya mengklaim rejeki nomploknya adalah warisan. Mereka pergi ke pengadilan. Mereka sekarang telah mencapai semacam kesepakatan rahasia , tetapi diskusi terus berlanjut. Hidup terus berlalu.

Industri lotere Grup Tatts menjalankan delapan lotere, termasuk TattsLotto, Oz Lotto dan Powerball. Ini adalah operator lotere swasta tertua di dunia. Ini dimulai pada tahun 1881 ketika pemungut cukai Sydney menyapu bersih Piala Sydney. Namanya George Adams. Seekor kuda bernama Kemajuan menang tahun itu, tetapi pemenang sebenarnya adalah George. Dia kemudian menemukan apa yang sekarang kita sebut Tatts Group .

Setiap tahun, orang Australia bertaruh sekitar A $ 20 miliar. Akun Pokies sekitar A $ 12 miliar, lotere menyumbang sekitar A $ 2 miliar. Sulit untuk mendapatkan angka pasti - tetapi dari A $ 2 miliar dari lotere, A $ 1,2 miliar dikembalikan dalam bentuk hadiah uang. A $ 800 juta lainnya dibagi antara biaya operasional, Tatts Group dan pemerintah negara bagian.

Bahwa orang Australia suka berjudi sudah jelas. Tapi kebanyakan tentang pokies, balapan dan, baru-baru ini, olahraga. Beberapa mengalami masalah - perjudian bermasalah mempengaruhi sekitar setengah juta orang Australia . Meskipun membeli tiket lotre terkadang dapat tersesat ke arena perjudian bermasalah, itu jarang terjadi.

Peluang memenangkan hadiah utama di TattsLotto dengan satu permainan adalah sekitar satu dari delapan juta. Peluang di Powerball sekitar satu dari 77 juta. Jadi, jika Anda membeli satu "quickpick" 12-game standar per minggu, Anda harus memenangkan TattsLotto sekali setiap 13 ribu tahun, dan Powerball sekali setiap 123 ribu tahun! Tentu saja ada hadiah yang lebih sedikit juga, dan seperti yang mereka katakan - Anda harus berada di dalamnya untuk memenangkannya! Tapi berapa banyak pemenang yang Anda kenal?

Peluang ini begitu bertumpuk melawan kita, sulit untuk menerima bahwa kita tetap percaya. Tapi percayalah - setiap minggu. Jika Anda memenangkan hadiah utama, Anda pasti seumur hidup. Kekayaan, perjalanan, kenyamanan, hak istimewa ... keberadaan tanpa rasa khawatir. Tampaknya. Bukan uang yang kita impikan, ini adalah gaya hidup. Memenangkan TattsLotto mewakili kehidupan di jalan yang mudah.

Apakah mimpi itu sesuai dengan kenyataan? Kadang-kadang, ada laporan bahwa memenangkan lotere akan menunjukkan hasil yang buruk.

Untungnya, ini adalah pengecualian, bukan aturannya. Tidak mengherankan, kebanyakan orang yang memenangkan lotere atau memiliki rejeki nomplok finansial yang besar memiliki kesehatan mental yang lebih baik setelahnya - yang berarti lebih sedikit episode depresi dan kecemasan. Ketika Anda bertanya kepada orang-orang tentang tingkat kebahagiaan mereka, mereka melaporkan periode singkat euforia setelah kemenangan, tetapi seiring waktu kebahagiaan mereka kembali ke tingkat kekayaan sebelumnya !

Adapun impian untuk meninggalkan pekerjaan Anda dan tinggal di pulau yang indah dikelilingi oleh staf… Tidak. Kebanyakan orang tinggal di daerah yang sama dan banyak yang terus bekerja di pekerjaan yang sama. Mereka hanya menghabiskan lebih banyak. Demikian pula untuk kesehatan mereka secara umum, tidak ada efek yang besar. Ini menarik: sebagian besar kekayaan dikaitkan dengan kesehatan yang lebih baik. Penelitian menunjukkan bahwa manfaat kemenangan lotere diimbangi dengan peningkatan kebiasaan minum dan merokok.

Jadi mengapa kita membeli tiket lotere? Jelas matematika memasukkan salah satu game Tatts tidak sesuai. Jika Anda benar-benar yakin dapat menghasilkan uang melalui perjudian, bukankah Anda akan memilih permainan yang tidak menyimpan 40% dari total hadiah? Atau membeli saham di perusahaan yang menjalankan lotere?

Satu-satunya pemenang yang konsisten dari permainan ini adalah yang disebut ahli waris Tattersalls . Setelah George Adams meninggal tanpa anak pada tahun 1904, dia meninggalkan perusahaan kepada sejumlah karyawan dan beberapa politisi. Sepanjang abad, saham melewati berbagai surat wasiat dan ketika perusahaan go public pada tahun 2005, sekitar 2.500 ahli waris Tattersalls menuai hasilnya.

Saya tidak berpikir kita bisa menyalahkan kesuksesan besar lotere pada naluri perjudian - perjudian bergantung pada kemenangan tak terduga yang terputus-putus - dan kemenangan lotere terlalu jarang untuk memicu naluri manusia ini. Perjudian hanyalah pendorong kecil lotere.

Jadi tentang apa itu semua? Sejujurnya, seperti kebanyakan perilaku manusia, tidak ada yang benar-benar tahu. Uang saya untuk ide harapan. Membeli tiket TattsLotto memberi Anda sedikit harapan. Mimpi. Anda bisa membayangkan hidup tidak terbebani oleh kendala keuangan.

Anda membeli kesempatan untuk duduk-duduk dan merenungkan apa yang akan Anda lakukan jika menang. Inilah daftar saya: liburan panjang, mobil baru, rumah liburan, drum kit yang sangat besar dan mewah, dan mengurangi pekerjaan menjadi dua hari per minggu. Saya akan tetap anonim dan saya akan menyewa pengacara, akuntan, dan penasihat keuangan. Saya juga akan menjaga karma dan memberikan sebagian untuk amal dan keluarga!

Tiket lotere memungkinkan Anda membuat perencanaan - Anda bertanya pada diri sendiri, "Apa yang membuat saya bahagia?" Ini memungkinkan Anda membandingkan catatan dengan teman Anda, “Anda akan berhenti? Bukan aku, aku akan membeli perusahaan dan memecat manajer idiot kita. Ha ha!" Ini memberi Anda harapan senilai $ 8,55. Harga yang harus dibayar.

Adapun pria Geelong di tengah kontroversi saat ini - saya curiga dia belajar bahwa ada garis tipis antara mimpi dan mimpi buruk.
creator: nweoxdpuiyp

content: I would like to know how to fix my problem. I chat with my son most nights & facebook just freezes up after a few minutes or so, I can usually get it unfrozen by restarting my pc, what else can I do? We chat sometimes for a couples of hours, but fb hardly ever works correctly, is is very frustrating. Email me with any suggestions, OK? - Thanks
creator: Albrit2

title: firefox homepage and gmail
content: Firefox homepage has suddenly started appearing as narrow vertical page. When going to fullscreen, menu bar disappears but reappears when cursor is on the next toolbar down. When it reappears there is no yellow minimize button. Also, can load gmail through Safari but not through firefox
creator: alsaguma

title: print page in browser
content: in one of the recent previous versions it was possible to print the webpage e.g. to pdf. when there was a lot of other info/characters on the preview, you could choose to simplify the page and a lot of text over text was gone, now it that not possible anymore; print web pages is gobbled up to that the basic web text is not readable anymore. Would it be possible to get this 'simplify page' back on the new print window? I have not a screenshot with that option to show, sorry for that. Thank you in advance. Theo
creator: adfly1

title: Preferences for PDF files
content:
After Firefox updated to version 86 yesterday a couple of my users are being prompted to select what they would like Firefox to do with a PDF file each time they download one. They set it to open in Foxit Reader and checked the box to do it automatically each time but it always goes back to the default setting. I confirmed that the Application settings in Options is set to use Foxit Reader for PDFs and I even followed the troubleshooting step for this issue and renamed the handlers.json file.

Also each time they try to download a PDF a prompt comes up asking for an admin password (see the 3rd image). These computers are on a domain, so the UAC prompt isn't unusual but we don't restrict them from being able to download files. But I'm having the same issue as well and I'm not on the domain, so I think this is more of a symptom then a cause.

Is this a bug in the latest update? I was troubleshooting a printer setting issue for them the day before yesterday. Did some testing on my computer and theirs, got it worked out that Foxit works best for their needs when printing a PDF from a web app. Then yesterday afternoon they began to have issues where they couldn't print at all. I checked it out and all of our computers updated to Firefox v86 and everything is now working differently now in terms of handling PDFs.

Thanks in advanced,

Josh
creator: jleary
